excerpts.title: Circle me (Google+)
excerpts.body:
Have you seen Google+?

Aside from making the name of their “like button” (Google+1) suddenly make a lot more sense, Google+ seems to be a very intuitive mix between Twitter & Facebook. And I really like it (or +1 it, I guess).

excerpts.title: Hey, I was reading that…
excerpts.body:
I’m a huge fan of web typography, but we’ll have to wait a bit longer to catch up with print.
Twitter surged last week with the news of Futura’s arrival at Typekit.

Futura PT’s classic design — tall ascenders, near perfect geometric shapes — make it both instantly recognizable and irrepressibly modern.
